means: 画[标]出…的轮廓( outline的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: Draw the basic outlines in black felt-tip pen (see fig. 4).
sentence.Network_cn: 用黑色毡头笔画出基本轮廓（见图4）。

sentence.Network_en: They agreed on the broad outlines of a wage settlement.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们就工资解决的办法达成框架协议.

sentence.Network_en: They agreed as to the grand outlines, but quibbled over particulars.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们对重大要点表示同意, 但对细节却含糊其词.

entry.def: If you outline an idea or a plan, you explain it in a general way.

example.ex: The mayor outlined his plan to clean up the town's image...
example.tran: 市长概述了他整顿市容的计划。

example.ex: The methods outlined in this book are only suggestions.
example.tran: 本书概括的一些方法仅供参考。

entry.def: An outline is a general explanation or description of something.

example.ex: Following is an outline of the survey findings...
The proposals were given in outline by the Secretary of State.
example.tran: 国务卿对提议进行了简要的概述。

entry.tran: （因背后的光线）显示…的轮廓（或外形）
entry.def: You say that an object is outlined when you can see its general shape because there is light behind it.

example.ex: The Ritz was outlined against the lights up there...
example.tran: 高悬的灯光映照出里兹饭店的轮廓。

example.ex: It was a beautiful sight outlined above the starry sky.

entry.def: The outline of something is its general shape, especially when it cannot be clearly seen.

example.ex: He could see only the hazy outline of the goalposts.
example.tran: 他只能看见球门柱模糊的轮廓。

auth_sentence.content: If they offered possible solutions, outlines were tentative.
auth_sentence.res_content: If they offered possible solutions, outlines were tentative.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If they offered possible solutions, outlines were tentative.

auth_sentence.content: He proudly outlines the group's own history.
auth_sentence.res_content: He proudly outlines the group's own history.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He proudly outlines the group's own history.

auth_sentence.content: This guide outlines what help is available.
auth_sentence.res_content: This guide outlines what help is available.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This guide outlines what help is available.
